line_1: With haughtier air the creatures strode,
line_2: Scarce had the thund'rer giv'n the nod

line_1: Vast his designs, with rising pride he strode,
line_2: And wild ambition taints his youthful blood;

line_1: Oft have our fearless fathers strode
line_2: At WALLACE' name, what Scottish blood,

line_1: Oft have our fearless fathers strode
line_2: But boils up in a spring-tide flood!

line_1: Oft have our fearless fathers strode
